RelatedSentence: ( WUSA9 ) - The skateboarding and snowboarding store in Columbia Mall where a gunman killed two employees before fatally shooting himself reopened Monday morning after being completely remodeled .
( WUSA9 ) - The skateboarding and snowboarding store in Columbia Mall where a gunman killed two employees before fatally shooting himself reopened Monday morning after being completely remodeled .
Police say 19 - year - old Darion Aguilar shot the two workers and then turned the gun on himself .
